attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dont you think it is about time you were
honest with the electorate and went to the country.To give us the chance to vote on all your short commings and had
a Government which has the backing of the country and is more up to the task of getting the great into our country
not the pathetic mess we are now in being run by non elective representatives i.e Mr Mandleson and the rest of the inefectual cabinate ministers we have at present.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
